TopicTitle: Tips for a Dormant KSP player

Articles.Content:
I want to exercise my KSP while not being in KSP, I remember all my past skills...I think... So anything that'll help me practice while away from KSC would help. I'm currently pursuing my dream of being a virtual train driver in a ACTUAL train game so, yeah. I'll get back to KSP some day...

Someday...
